acceptanceCriteria: Home/About hero heading no longer contains “Alex Johnson” and instead shows “Vedika Pawar”.
Home/About subtitle/intro text clearly states “Web Developer” and mentions “30 years of experience” in natural English.
Contact page contact info (email/phone/location) no longer uses alex.johnson@example.com or other Alex placeholders.
No page renders the name “Alex” anywhere in visible text.

requirements.text: Remove all template/platform branding so the site does not show “caffeine.ai” (or “Caffeine AI app”) anywhere in the UI, including the footer link.

quotes: don't show the caffeine ai app name in last I want to show it as I make it

acceptanceCriteria: Footer no longer contains a link to https://caffeine.ai or the text “caffeine.ai”.
The phrase “Caffeine” / “caffeine.ai” does not appear anywhere in the rendered UI (header, footer, or pages).
Footer still displays a clean, self-made style copyright line without external platform branding.

requirements.text: Update the site header branding (logo/brand text) to reflect Vedika Pawar’s portfolio (e.g., “Vedika Pawar” or “Vedika Pawar Portfolio”) while keeping existing navigation items and routes unchanged.

quotes: add vedikapawar as web developer as it is her portfolio

acceptanceCriteria: Header brand text is no longer the generic “Portfolio”.
Navigation still includes Home, Education, Skills, Gallery, Contact and routes continue to work.

requirements.text: Keep the website aligned with the PEP Class 10 project brief by ensuring the content clearly covers: introduction, education details, skills list, image gallery, and a working contact form, with a simple, basic presentation.

quotes: Students will create a multi-section,multi-page personal portfolio website that includes: Introduction about themselves Education details Skills list Image gallery Contact form Styled layout using CSS

acceptanceCriteria: Each of the five pages (Home/About, Education, Skills, Gallery, Contact) remains accessible via navigation.
The Contact form still validates required fields and submits successfully through the existing submission flow.
The overall copy and layout reads as a simple student portfolio (not a platform demo), while keeping all text in English.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources).
Do not modify immutable hook files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain single-actor in backend/main.mo; only introduce migration.mo if persistent state schema changes (not expected for this request).
nonGoals: Do not add WordPress integration or any external hosting/deployment-specific features.
Do not add third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Do not implement admin UI for viewing contact submissions unless explicitly requested.
